item.title: Home
item.description: Thotheris Don’t bargan away the future for the present Welcome, I am Thothean Servia. I am learning beginner level software developer specializing in: Bitcoin Lightning Network Ethereum Peer to Peer networks (Yggdrasil) My personal beliefs are these technologies will allow a new age of financal freedom to those who wish to escape the centralized banking system as well as those who are unbanked by being more competitive than the old systems.
